description: Gets the list of all jobs for a thing that are not in a terminal status. Requires permission to access the GetPendingJobExecutions action.

parameters.name: thingName
parameters.description: The name of the thing that is executing the job.

nested_items.name: inProgressJobs
nested_items.description: A list of JobExecutionSummary objects with status IN_PROGRESS.

nested_items.name: jobId
nested_items.description: The unique identifier you assigned to this job when it was created.

nested_items.name: queuedAt
nested_items.description: The time, in seconds since the epoch, when the job execution was enqueued.

nested_items.name: startedAt
nested_items.description: The time, in seconds since the epoch, when the job execution started.

nested_items.name: lastUpdatedAt
nested_items.description: The time, in seconds since the epoch, when the job execution was last updated.

nested_items.name: versionNumber
nested_items.description: The version of the job execution. Job execution versions are incremented each time IoT Jobs receives an update from a device.

nested_items.name: executionNumber
nested_items.description: A number that identifies a particular job execution on a particular device.

nested_items.name: queuedJobs
nested_items.description: A list of JobExecutionSummary objects with status QUEUED.

nested_items.name: jobId
nested_items.description: The unique identifier you assigned to this job when it was created.

nested_items.name: queuedAt
nested_items.description: The time, in seconds since the epoch, when the job execution was enqueued.

nested_items.name: startedAt
nested_items.description: The time, in seconds since the epoch, when the job execution started.

nested_items.name: lastUpdatedAt
nested_items.description: The time, in seconds since the epoch, when the job execution was last updated.

nested_items.name: versionNumber
nested_items.description: The version of the job execution. Job execution versions are incremented each time IoT Jobs receives an update from a device.

nested_items.name: executionNumber
nested_items.description: A number that identifies a particular job execution on a particular device.
